Kisah Pilu Nur Magfira: Diduga Derita Lumpuh Layu dan Ditinggal Sang Ibu
03 Nov 2019, 23:49 by Abdy Febriady
Polewali Mandar - Malang nasib Nur Magfira (7 tahun), anak semata wayang pasangan Muliadi dan Marwayani, warga Dusun Panre-Panreng, Desa Tumpiling, Kecamatan Wonomulyo, Kabupaten Polewali Mandar, Sulawesi Barat. Gadis kecil itu diduga menderita lumpuh layu.
Kondisi tersebut pun mengakibatan fisik Nur Magfira terlihat lebih kecil bahkan kaku. Magfira juga belum bisa duduk apalagi berjalan. Sehari-hari Nur Magfira hanya bisa berbaring dan menangis jika membutuhkan sesuatu. Seluruh aktifitasnya hanya dapat dilakukan dengan bantuan orang lain.
Diakui sang ayah Mualidi, kondisi memprihatinkan yang dialami buah hatinya tersebut, telah terjadi saat usianya baru menginjak tujuh bulan.
"Waktu itu dia tiba-tiba demam tinggi, tidak pernah diperiksakan ke dokter untuk diberi obat, selain karena persoalan biaya, saya fikirnya itu hanya demam biasa " ungkap Muliadi kepada wartawan, Minggu (3/11/19).
Sejak saat itu, pertumbuhan fisik dan kondisi Nur Magfira diketahui tidak normal lagi. Di usianya sekarang ini, berat badan Nur Magfira hanya 10 kilogram saja. Tubuhnyapun terlihat kurus, menampakkan tulang yang terbungkus kulit.

The Story of Pilu Nur Magfira: Allegedly Withered Paralyzed Suffering and Left by the Mother
03 Nov 2019, 23:49 by Abdy Febriady
Polewali Mandar - Malang, the fate of Nur Magfira (7 years), the only child of the couple Muliadi and Marwayani, residents of Panre-Panreng Hamlet, Tumpiling Village, Wonomulyo District, Polewali Mandar Regency, West Sulawesi. The little girl was thought to suffer from paralysis withered.
These conditions also resulted in Nur Magfira's physical appearance being smaller and even stiffer. Magfira also can not sit or walk. Everyday Nur Magfira can only lie down and cry if she needs something. All activities can only be done with the help of others.
Mualidi's father admitted, the appalling conditions experienced by his baby, had occurred when he was only stepping on seven months.
"At that time he suddenly had a high fever, had never been consulted by a doctor to be given medicine, other than because of the cost issue, I think it was just an ordinary fever," Muliadi told reporters on Sunday (3/11/19).
Since then, the physical growth and condition of Nur Magfira is no longer known to be normal. At his age, Nur Magfira weighs only 10 kilograms. His body looks thin, revealing bones wrapped in skin.
